title: Enslaved.Odyssey.To.The.West-R.G.Mechanics

Enslaved.Odyssey.To.The.West-R.G.Mechanics


Year: 2013
Publication Type: RePack | RG Mechanics
Crack: enclosing | SKiDROW
Version: 1.0
Language:  RUS,  ENG
Language:  ENG

Description: 

The main character named Monkey and all his life he was running away 
from robots and have put up with his hermit life. He athletic, agile, 
strong and true to its name on everything one - not something that 
jumps better monkeys, and even better Nariko from Heavenly Sword. 
But eventually it will catch robots. In captivity, he met a girl 
named Tripp, who well versed in technology, and agree 
(not voluntarily, however) to help her get to his home. 
The game will take us into the future. Exactly 150 years. 
As usual, in the beautiful and remote did not expect anything good. 
Mankind will be virtually wiped off the face of the Earth, 
and the planet will roam hordes of robots that gradually destroy 
all surviving Homo sapiens. The composition of Premium Edition 
includes the original version of the game, with DLC Ã‚Â«Pigsy's 
Perfect 10" and a set of skins for the main characters 
(Ninja Monkey, Classic Monkey and Sexy Trip).


System requirements:

Operating system: Windows XP (SP3), Windows Vista (SP2), Windows 7 (SP1), Windows 8 
Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.2 GHz or AMD Athlon II X2 2.8 GHz 
Memory: 2 GB 
Video: Nvidia GeForce 9600 GT or ATI Radeon HD 4850 with 512 MB 
Sound device: compatible with DirectX 9.0 
Free disk space: 17 GB
Starting: Install and play.

Repack Features  

Enslaved: Odyssey to the West Premium Edition 
Do not cut / no recoded 
Softonic text from Blackout Team v1.05 
Release from RG Mechanics
